system.description: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character suffers 5+ Critical Damage in a Single Battle during a mission and survives. If this character would be rendered unconcious by a Critical Effect or excessive Fatigue, they can make a +0 Willpower Test. If successful they remain conccious, but suffer 1 Damage ignoring Armour and Toughness at the end of each of their turns. At the beginning of each turn they may choose to collapse to end the damaging effect.

rollConfig.description: Willpower test to remain conscious despite Critical Effects or Fatigue

specialAbilities.name: Remain Conscious
specialAbilities.description: When rendered unconscious by Critical Effect or excessive Fatigue, make a Willpower Test. On success, remain conscious but suffer 1 damage (ignoring armor/TB) at end of each turn. May choose to collapse at start of any turn to end this effect.
